c1.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
c1.effect: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

c2.name: Right of Final Interpretation
c2.effect: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

c3.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Signed Edict** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Supreme Amnesty
c4.effect:
When **Done Deal** is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.

c5.name: Abiding Affidavit
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Done Deal** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Extra Clause
c6.effect: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.
